name: Fast Food Classic
description: The drink you made at the beverage station every time your mom took you to Wendy's until you were 15
directions: Make your fast food order a meal so it comes with a drink
Create the perfect blend of sodas at the neverage station. Don't be afraid to stray from the recipe and try new things
Drink at least 1/3 of it at the beverage station and fill it back up
Optionally, head back for a refill or try a new blend!
